resources.comments: Conditional deployment for Azure Hub Network Resources in the Platform Connectivity subscription
resources.name: [take(concat('hubSpokeConnectivity-', guid(deployment().name)), 64)]

resources.comments: Nested deployment for Azure Hub Network Resources
resources.name: [take(concat('hubSpokeConnectivity-', guid(deployment().name)), 64)]

properties.subnets:
[
                                                             union(
                                                                  if(
                                                                      not(
                                                                          empty(parameters('subnetMaskForGw'))), variables('gwSubnet'), json('[]')), 
                                                                          if(
                                                                              not(
                                                                                  empty(parameters('subnetMaskForazfw'))), variables('fwSubnet'), json('[]')))]

resources.comments: Conditional deployment of Azure Bastion Subnet
resources.name: [concat(parameters('vhub'), '/', 'AzureBastionSubnet')]

resources.comments: Conditional deployment of the Azure App Gateway Subnet
resources.name: [concat(parameters('vhub'), '/', variables('appGwySubnet'))]

resources.comments: Conditional deployment of the Azure Bastion NSG
